['Come out, come out wherever you are to join Timmy and his preschool playmates for hide and seek and so much more! From finding the perfect hiding place for noisy Paxton to making paper boats with a sneezy Stripey, Timmy and his friends uncover adventure and surprises filled with fun and laughter in these five adorable stories that the whole family will enjoy. Who don't like Timmy time.
Five Stars
The GiggleBellies Musical Adventures Volume #1
Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD
['Meet the lovable GiggleBellies! A fresh and modern twist to preschool DVD\'s and music is finally here. Watch "The GiggleBellies" giggle and wiggle right into your little one\'s hearts. The Engaging multi-award winning DVD series combines colorful whimsical worlds, endearing characters, and fun upbeat music that even parents can enjoy! This fully animated music video DVD will keep your toes tapping and everyone can join the fun by singing and dancing along. Winner of multiple awards and accolades including “2010 DVD OF THE YEAR AWARD by Creative Child Magazine” and “Dr. Toy\'s Best Picks 2013”. Approximately 28 minutes with 9 animated music videos including:   The GiggleBelly Train  Old MacDonald Had A Farm  Wheels On The Bus  Peanut  ABC Superstar  Web Footed Friends  Jumping Monkeys  Kooky Bird  Twinkle Twinkle Little Star -adapted version with male singer.   You will need a computer with a DVD drive to access Downloadable & Printable items:  MP3’s of all 9 songs to download and create your own music CD  10 coloring pages  9 Fully illustrated lyric sheets  2 Fun & fantastic wallpapers  DVD runs Approx. 28 min, Region 0, Format NTSC.  DVD’s are designed to be viewed on anything that can play a DVD. If you expect to view our products across multiple media platforms, such as mobile devices, Apple TV, etc., please look for digital options via our online store. Not familiar with The GiggleBellies? Preview before you purchase! Subscribe to “The GiggleBellies” YouTube Channel and watch lower-res preview clips with your child to see if they enjoy it.']

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference**: The user maintains a strong focus on engaging and entertaining children's programming that is suitable for young audiences, favoring family-friendly content infused with humor and action. Their emphasis remains on musical and interactive media that promotes active participation.

- **Family-Oriented**: They value shared viewing experiences with their child, seeking content that resonates with all family members and encourages interaction through singing, dancing, and engagement.

- **Language Accessibility**: The user prefers content in English and appreciates subtitles for better understanding. Recent interest in Spanish audio and subtitles indicates a growing openness to bilingual content while still prioritizing English-language options.

- **High Standards**: They demonstrate discerning standards, having maintained a strong average rating of 4.8 across interactions, although a recent lower rating of 3.0 highlights their expectation for content to hold the attention of young viewers. Their commitment to quality children’s media remains crucial.

- **Creators and Studios**: The user continues to favor reputable directors and production studios recognized for high-quality children’s content, affirming their trust in established creators. They have shown a particular appreciation for well-known talent in animation.

- **Recent Interaction**: Their latest experience reflects a cautious approach to new content, emphasizing the need for engaging material that captures the attention of young audiences and aligns with their high standards. They remain dedicated to exploring diverse genres within the frame of quality and engagement for children.
